title: Stop The World
description: Based on a true story. Beauty Queen, Jody Angel Taylor, believes her life is all mapped out - glamorous, clever and popular, and due to marry her handsome boyfriend, she has it all. Until one night she has a devastating car crash, ending up paralyzed - and her perfect world collapses.  Committing media suicide and publicly blamed for her own accident, everything around her falls apart. She becomes a lonely recluse, feeling she’s lost everything including her legs - her boyfriend to her best friend, her father to an affair, her mother to depression - but above all she fears losing her mind.  What she doesn’t know is that someone across the globe is about to throw her a lifeline. Can she find the courage to take it?  Determined to love again and clear her name, she embarks on a new adventure that will transform her life beyond all expectations.
author: Sherry Mayes
